body: Damage to your Dexterity score causes you to take penalties on Dexterity-based skill checks, ranged attack rolls, initiative checks, and Reflex saving throws. The penalty also applies to your Armor Class, your Combat Maneuver Bonus (if you are Tiny or smaller), and to your Combat Maneuver Defense.
name: Dexterity
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Glossary/Special Abilities/Ability Score Damage/Penalty/and Drain/Dexterity
